flawed_nl_solution:
He starts with 4 blue marbles because 10 x 0.4 = <<10*0.4=4>>4
60% of the marbles are red because 100 - 40 = <<100-40=60>>60
He has 6 red marbles because 10 x 0.6 = <<10*0.6=6>>6
He trades 10 red marbles because 6 - 1 = <<6-1=10>>10
He gets 20 blue marbles because 10 x 2 = <<10*2=20>>20
He has 25 marbles now because 4 + 1 + 20 = <<4+1+20=25>>25
#### 25

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5, not 10. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
